trees-additional.advice-from-authority: Tree officer visited site on 15/06/2025 and confirmed that the mature oak (T1) is showing signs of decay in the main stem. Recommended immediate arboricultural assessment and consideration of pollarding rather than complete removal to preserve wildlife habitat.

supporting-documents.name: Tree Location and Context Plan
supporting-documents.description: Detailed site plan showing location of T1 oak tree, property boundaries, and affected structures

supporting-documents.name: Arboricultural Impact Assessment
supporting-documents.description: BS5837:2012 compliant assessment by qualified arboriculturist detailing tree condition, decay extent, and recommended management options
